actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Slaughter. Petition No: 106-11.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2457) to prohibit health insurance and employment discrimination against individuals and their family members on the basis of predictive genetic information or genetic services.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2457 (genetic nondiscrimination in health insurance and employment).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2457) to prohibit health insurance and employment discrimination against individuals and their family members on the basis of predictive genetic information or genetic services.
